Class ingen.html.table.TableCaption 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----ingen.html.HtmlTag
           |
           +----ingen.html.table.TableCaption
public class TableCaption
extends HtmlTag

TableCaption(String, String, String)
SUMMARY:
Creates Object equivalent of CAPTION Html Tag, which place a caption in an HTML table.

PARAMETERS
1) String caption : the text for the caption.

TableCaption 
 public TableCaption(String caption,
                     String Align,
                     String Attribs)
SUMMARY:
Creates Object equivalent of CAPTION Html Tag, which place a caption in an HTML table.

PARAMETERS
1) String caption : the text for the caption.
2) String Align   : the value for the ALIGN attribute.
3) String Attribs : other attributes to be included as-is in the tag.

GENERATES
<CAPTION Align="Align" Attribs> caption </CAPTION>
